data.message: Hi, Guys .. I tried to change to my Fb band page, but was denied. I appealed the decision but haven't heard anything. Our current band name is Southbound and want to change to The Dixie Tornados. There are so many bands in our area with south in the name our band gets confused with other bands. Please any help you can give us will be appreciated. Thanks, Joseph Wells

replies.message: Hi Joseph. You can follow these instructions to change your Page's name: http://bit.ly/2uKl85f. You can also learn more about what Page names are allowed on Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2uciCD6. Keep in mind if you recently submitted a Page name change, you will be unable to make additional name change requests at this time. -Ashley

Hi Ashley, I have already did the procedure to change the name. I went to my page under the about section and edited the new night. I simply want to change it from southbound to the Dixie tornadoes for the reasons I stated. I hope you can help me
